pullRequest.body:
- Weaken TC assumptions of many lemmas from `SigmaFinite` to `SFinite`.
- Drop some `MeasurableSet` assumptions.

---

I disagree with that comment: the group is assumed to be locally compact, through the existence of a positive compact set in the statement.
I defer to @sgouezel !
Indeed, I shouldn't try to fix comments after midnight.
